EmailTemplate.name: 202007_APAC_ATR_UV_Lighting_for_Cleaner_Air_Travel_Webinar.202007_APAC_ATR_UV_Li
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Honeywell UV Airplane Cabin Cleaner Now Available For You and Your Passengers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Air travel has entered a new era: a time in which improving cleanliness and building passenger and employee trust are more vital than ever. Honeywell is there to help, creating products that enhance confidence through the entire journey.
To introduce you to one of these important technologies we're hosting a webinar on Thursday July 30th at 10:00 AM SGT. This webinar will focus on the Honeywell UV Cabin Cleaning System.
You are cordially invited, along with your colleagues, to join us online for this important update as you look to return to normalized operations. We expect the webinar to last approximately 60 minutes.
We look forward to meeting you through our Cleaner Air Travel webinar. To register, please click on the link below.
Sincerely,
Andrew Wong VP Sales, APAC - Airlines REGISTER NOW <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2020/07/atr-uv-lighting-webinar-s2]]>
